MyDrive.text1: A place for all of your files

Recent.text2: See all the files you're recently edited or added

Starred.text2: Add stars to things that you want to easily find later

Shared.text2: Find and manage all the files shared with you in one place.

Trash.text2: Move items you don't need to trash. Items in trash will be deleted forever after you delete them from here

search.text2: Adjust your query or try searching all of Drive
